values:
I am so in love!
I have been with Ryan now for almost 8 months and I think everyday I spend with him is always better than the last.I love laying around with him and looking into his beautiful blue eyes and know that I am welcome wrapped up in his arms. Knowing that he will always be there for me and love me as I do him as well...I wish everyone knew a love like mine cause maybe then there would be less stupid occurances and alot less fighting.I love love, expecially when I am sharing it with Ryan. I love you Ryan and I always will!

                      --Lauren

:)The other day Ryan came over and we had such a great time , Everytime I am with him I am never afraid to act myself..I guess that is a quality that will have to be there if you ever plan on staying with one another, and which I do plan on doing !I cannot wait to see him ON SATURDAY ...
Christy is gonna come and get me ON Sunday , I am so excited...I miss her so so much, I love being around my friends, and me being gone all summer really made it hard on me but hey I get to see them now and I get to see Ryan so that is all I need! YEAH!BAM!

xRyanXLaurenx<3

I went to the movies the other day with Ryan..We went to see The Terminal..It was a good movie.........:-D I wish he could have come back to the house and "hung out" for a while but I guess you cannot always get what you want...:(
Jessica is comming over on Saturday It is going to be so much fun, I love getting together with her..we always have fun and act like doofuses (lol)
I wish I could see Ryan :*



XRyanXLaurenX

I have been a very buisy beaver lately:-P, I work every day to atleast 7 and when I get home I always have to help with something ,Even if it is small before I can eat,Talk to Ryan and finally crash.
 Ryan came over the other day with Jimmy, they brought a movie as usual, but I am not really sure as to what the movie was about or even the title, but man it was good! (lol). I always have a good time with him, as I have said a million times before, but it always seems to me as never enough ,I dont think he will ever know how much I appreciate him or even how much I care. I wish there were a word for it cause I seem I always come short of being able to tell him how much I DO care.The words never want to come out as they sound in my head.... but I guess that happens to alot of people now days.But I do try!...atleast.
I miss him so so much! I wish I could be with him every hour of every day...But..one day that wish will come true:)I shouldn't complain cause atleast I have him and I get to see him as often as I do.<3
In 4 days is will be one month since we first started going out, It doesn't really seem that long but it is awesome and I am so excited!I <3 Ryan !!

XRyanXLaurenX

I haven't written in this sucker for quite a couple days.:-P well the last few days have been ok I guess however I really enjoyed going out on the boat with Ryan last weekend.I never have been happier than I am when I am with him. He always listens to me whine,and he puts up with all my stupid crap.I have learned from experiance that it is hard to find someone as sincere as he is, and I am so grateful that he gave me a chance to be with him, I really couldn't see myself anyother way ....ever. I hope I get to see him soon!

XRyanxLaurenX

P.S :-p I MISS EVERYONE !

Last night was awesome , Ryan and Jimmy came over and hung out after they got off of work, they got there kinda late so we didnt get to watch the movie we wanted to watch so We "sat around" for a while and "watched" home alone three..GREAT MOVIE :-P I would soooo watch that movie again any day ;)(lol)Doesn't really sound like that good of a night..but I guess you had to be there 


XLaurenxRyanX

I just got back from NJ.It was a good experiance but it is always nice to come home. I miss Ryan , I would do anything for him to come here or for me to be with him. I really dont want to be sad about not being able to see him but I cannot help it.He is all I have been thinking about.But atleast I have something to care for..AND boy do I ! ;)



XRyanXLaurenX<3

*sigh*  The plain ride was crazy ,I dont think that my ears have ever felt so much pressure..but fortunately I am here:-p ...I am having a good time for being with family.I miss Ryan :( I had an awesome time though last night when he came over.It was awesome just being able to lay around with him,talk and hold him.Cannot wait to see him again,Iam so so so so happy we are together:)I am relizing that I miss alot of things I took for granted that are back home ...like just hanging out with my friends..but the summer has to come to an end sometime so I better enjoy it while it lasts :)XRyanxLaurenX:)

THESE LAST FEW DAYS HAVE BEEN AMAZING.On thurday Christy and Allen went and got Ryan<3 then they came and got me :-P I have NEVER been so exited to see anyone as I was that day .Well anyway we drove around all day going to thrift stores and what not, but it was lotsa fun. Yesterday Ryan came over and hung out with us again.I enjoy seeing him so much, I hate it when he has to go home I feel likE I cannot squeese him hard enough or be close enough to him.I like him so much.when I am around him I feel so wanted and I dont care what anyone else has to say,but I guess it should be that way.So NOW I have a boyfriend after all that grief and pain over other boys , but he makes everything ok.and I have never been happier.I cannot wait until the summer is over :-\ I want to be able to see everybody like I use to.But everything will be ok.




<3Ryan.

I havent written in lj for like ...ever, there isn't much going on with me though besides I am in Spring Hill and I met this awesome guy it is sad though that he is back in citrus :( . I am comming down to citrus in 2 weeks and I cannot wait to see Christy and Allen. I thought I would never say this, but I am actually excited to come back for a while.I miss all the drama and my friends. WOA 











--Christy here I come !

hmmmm sure has been a long time from when I last up dated..I guess it is hard to find time to update when I have SUCH a buisy life :P  ..bah i HAVE NOTHING TO SAY ..everyone is soo sad....















"I guess it is all the EmoSean that is bringing me down"

Besides the fact that we have had the past three days off, does anyone else find the days getting a little bit stranger? On Saturday I went and took my four hour A.D.A.P.T class. I passed it with a 100% but it was easy cheesy, anyway..Today(easter) I am sick and I have been thinking alot ..when I think the way I have been lately, I always tend to make things worse then they actually are ..so I am trying my hardest not to :P I woke up and had to go to this easter brunch thing at the Country club in Glen Lakes, Spring Hill it was ok but I didn't feel good , the food was the only totally kick but thing there ..but for how much my aunt payed it better have been :)
I had fun at Christy's even though she was sick, I tried my hardest to do whatever I could for her,:|didn't do quite as good as I should have though ,but I love her and she knows it :)hope she gets better soon though .
I sure do have alot to do !!

today I did nothing. Yesterday I went to clearwater to go to the beach, no parking spaces..I went home..and ate . yum :I
















Amanda told me to do this...umm...shoot thats one word.
I have streaky (fake) tan legs. I am going home tomorrow. I had a good day. I am hungry ~~

BIRTHDAY CHRISTY !
~~make it a good one *wink wink

Today was a really LOONG day , when I got up at nine me and my aunt and her friend Nikki took me to a tea house , it was so creepy . The food was expensive but good and the flowers and low music made me feel as if I were in a funeral home...wierd

Saturday I went to the beach and I got so burnt, I guess I stayed on my stomach too long and all behind my knees ,back , and shoulders are PURPLE ! and it is all because I didn't want to wear sunblock !I cannot sit or lay down or anything..I want to sleep so bad t0o..:( NEXT TIME I am going to wear a whole tube of sunblock ..Ill show them! ~I hope I don't get CANCER !

This is going to be one preppy spring break. This weekend I am going to the beach and then next week..shopping, I cannot complain though. I do like to get away once in a while and have a little change, but who doesn't? Citrus County can get a little TOO intense sometimes..there is so much drama, everyone hates everyone and it gets soo old when you listen the same people talk about the same things over and over again because they know nothing else..GET OUT OF CITRUS! heh I find myself doing that too though :( Another problem with Citrus County is that there are so many rude, selfish people. People are so quick to point out what I do wrong that they completely look past everything that they do wrong. People need to learn to tend to there own problems..I am soo tired of having people kick ME down and walk all over me..thats bs and it isn't going to happen anymore..C'MON MESS WITH ME !! :0

School has been getting stranger and stranger..I honestly want to know why things have changed so much, I do the same things everyday ..but it seems everyday I feel more and more like I am not doing enough stuff? err
my weekend was strange, so strange but good.
me [thanks to Christy for uploading this picture and helping me make it smaller..I love her oh yes..this is her by the way] love is in the air!

I am sitting here trying to find a song that I can use for english..you never really realize how hard it is until you are looking:(well anyway.Today was another "LAUREN" day. I slept ,woke up, and ate ..but we went out to eat so the eating part was more exciting than usual.:)..I tryed to call Christy , but I forgot where she was ..;) and I hope she has fun !hah..I sure wish I had something to do or somewhere to be right now.But it is "ALL GRAVY BABY" heh
I woke up today to the sun shining in on my face, sure I love the sun but gosh darn it man, do you really have to get all up in my grill so early? I hope today is a good day :)
Everyone is so so sad, Everyone cheer up! have a good day live life to the fullest man!:)now if only I could realize that...*hmpf
Today was ok actually, nothing great but ok.
People tell me all the time that you hate me, but I ignore them and carry on with my normal day, but now I see the truth and I am soo happy that you aren't pretending anymore.

It is now 11:27 and I am sitting here bored..while christy sleeps,she should be lucky I love her enough to let her sleep lol.Tonight is the stupid Valentines dance I am taking Christy hopefully we will have a good time..School has been ok lately, Veronica came back..and things are same ol' with happy Jes & Stan!Photograhy is really boring but I am learning more and more everyday so I guess I shouldn't complain. For 25 $ a semester you would think it would be better though.I think it is time for a change in my life :). I am always feeling so cluttered and I hate feeling cluttered. But, I am pretty sure i'll be ok lol.

today was good..I went to church with c and then we went to Dennys which is a change we normally go to mcdonalds..but anyway after we went to the mall and hung out with this new kid Jeff, hes coo so over all today was good.

This week has been so crazy...monday as usual was boring tuesday as well...but wednesday...wednesday, I almost was killed...when I got off the bus I saw this dog run accross the road..I told the bus driver that last time I got off the bus when I saw this dog he chased me all the way home..and my legs got all scraped up, but anyway she told me that she didn't know what to say and that if the dog comes after me to kick it in the head :/..so stupid me I got off the bus.. I saw the dog in its kennel and figured it would all be ok..but I didn't know that there were a few of them so I got a little further down the road and then the other dog came out from behind the truck..I WAS SO FRICKEN SCARED, so I ran over to the closest gate and jumped over it..I got caught and fell right on my head..and my books fell on my head..I got away by climbing the fence behind the house in that yard.I got lost in the woods for like and hour and then I finally found my way home (I thought that I was never gonna get to see any my best friends or family again)..I had to be rushed to the hospital..and so now I am on some pills..you guys shoulda seen me on thursday.I had such a hard time processing film in photo lol .Movin' on...FRIDAY I went to christy's to go to the show at the knk and after I stayed there(or course)it was a rockin' show ..I got a head ace cause I forgot my pain pills so sweet sweet Dan went over to the store and bought me some *sigh..some people can be so thoughtful..today was a good day..I went home for a couple hours to dp some cleaning and then I came back to Christy's..fun fun, we went to see the play at playhouse 19..I have never been to a play so it was a great experience.
I went to see along came polly with Stan and Jes today! Other thsn that...things were like usual.

*SIGH* these few days have been so great.....friday after school my mom drove me up to Spring Hill, we had a b-day party for my cousin. We went to bed at like 1:00 and I was soo tired..The next day (saturday) I had to get up early to bring all the lil kids home, after I came back got ready and we were off to the Inverness's soccer fields.My cousin lost the game 0 to like 8. After we wen't to the superbowl of motor sports, that was the coolest thing I have gone to in like forever. My aunt is personal friends with Madusa and Grave Digger, I got to meet them and everythin'and unsuspectedly there were a few people from Lecanto.:) well we got home late and I actually got to sleep in for once, but as sooon as i got up I did my hair and we were off again..we went to the Crystal River Chillie's..I found a green crayon there I am going to put in Jes and me's (L0L) time capsle..IT IS COMMING ALONG VERY WELL. I am here now at Jes's and it seems everytime we hang out it gets better and better, we always laugh about stupid stuff...and those make the best times !...hah Jes has been walking around the house in underwear.It is the funniest thing I have seen on FOREVER!..anyway..the night is getting to be early morning....and I am getting very tired

lately things have been soo great..I wake up in the morning ..get dressed and go to school ..every morning my day begins to Jes and Stan staring into each others eyes (making out)lol by the water fountains..could a day start any better? well not if you are me. School is boring as usual..but somehow I get through :)Today is my cousins b-day so I am here in Spring Hill (again)..it has been a really cute party so far..all the little kids running around playing with the new toys..went to wal*mart before I came here, I got the new Blink-182 cd (they soooo kick butt!)and a a few new shirts..wish myb home pc was fixed.*sigh*

YAY JES SUNDAY IS SOO GONNA RULE "I HAVE YOUR BUTT ALL TO MYSELF "(THAT DAY)MUAHAH WOOT WOOT!

I am at a loss of words today....I just got back from Christy's..Man..what a week.The new years was great... I sat with Jess and Stan :)and watched the fire works that were going on at Rock Crusher Canyon ,it was probubly the best new years I have ever had...
I know these journal things are way over rated but..eh wuteva , was a good day actually....hung out with Christy..did stuff FUN
